--0-475581197-1076034814=:4184
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii


In the forrest where Dragos was last spoted going to SureStrike and the rest of the combiner crew came across a scene. The scene looked like a battle was brought out of know but at the same time everywhere. Almost as if the barriers of the dimensions folded into two. SureStrike begins to anlyze the scene. He looks towards Cooley and says "Well I can pickup Dragos and Argos weapons fired here. But this is confuzing. It is almost as if the other set of weapons fire is Identical yet seperate from the Dragos, As if there was a clone." Cooley looked towards SureStrike as if in confusion. "How was our weapons cloned. I mean they are designed to use no traceable signal." Cooley said. 

"Well there is a way, But that is if we are cloned." SureStrike replied to Cooley with a concerned look to him. 

"If that is the case then what are we doing we need to find Dragos ans Argos before they die. That is if they aren't already dead themselves." replyed Cooley. At that they take off again to check the area for scraps and other parts but they find none. They Soon decide to setup a signal to to Report back to the maximal base. "Maximals this is SureStrike, we are done searching section 43 degrees south by 18 degrees east. We are now moving into the Badlands. Please do not worry bout us. I am setting up this relay station so we could still keep in communication." SureStrike set to the base on a repeat loop. to make sure that any maximal will get it.
